Reviews.Title: Camera is Fantastic but some accesories are worthless
Reviews.Author: James Corkrum
Reviews.Content: The camera and the telephoto lens are amazing, to say the least. I love this camera for its features and its compactness...much easier and lighter to use than my Nikon. I used it to photograph a Giants baseball game, a 49er game, and the America's Cup. Very, very pleased with all the images. The camera and additional lens are 5 stars!I loved getting the additional battery and the 64GM memory card. The two UV filters are just fine. The battery charger is a bit dubious. It works, but the two plastic pieces that stick up to hold the battery in place broke off in no time at all. A very stupid design. As for the other accessories, they seem to be OK but I have not really used them yet.The worst part of this kit is the case. It is way too small to be of much use. It will hold the camera, but not the telephoto lens. It will also hold a few accessories, but not many. I will have to buy a new case that I can use. No one put any thought into including this item. I would send it back, but it is part of a kit, so no way to do that. May give it to Goodwill.

Reviews.Title: great features, great size
Reviews.Author: Peter E. Safir
Reviews.Content: I wanted a smaller feature rich camera to travel with so as not to have to take my Canon 7D wonderful DSLR plus lenses.  This is a great alternative and has easy to use controls.  I like it much better than the Olympus I bought two years ago which I need the manual to use most of the time

Reviews.Title: Good set
Reviews.Author: Santiago Gutierrez
Reviews.Content: The camera wokrs just fine, I love the size, I can travel with the unit and two lenses in less space tan with my old camera Nikon D3100, It does the job and the quallity of the assembly is great, the pictures just fine. I have problems with the macro function but I am exploring it. The extra macro and wide view lenses didnt work well because I can see the borders on the picture and didnt have full compatibility with the original lenses I have to use the adapters (included) , the rest of the equipment Works well

Reviews.Title: Great Customer service and a beautiful camera... nothing to lose!
Reviews.Author: A. Nashad "book crazy"
Reviews.Content: Firstly, I loved Cameta Camera's customer service. I had initially ordered the wrong item, they were very helpful and courteous in helping me get the right product.The SONY nex 6 package is absolutely brilliant. Highly recommend. The camera is light and the lenses smooth.

Reviews.Title: Nex 6 Ratings
Reviews.Author: George . Baker
Reviews.Content: Overall, I am very please with the picture quality and features.Cons:1. I didn't not receive an HDMI cable with this order. Didn't read the fine print. I called the vendor but they said this camera did not come with one, so I had to spend another 20.00.2. Cannot plug in an external microphone. Again didn't read the fine print3. Camera bag too small for all the accessories4. Camera needs a firmware update in order to use some of the apps ie. remote and uploads and etc.5. Instructions on how to use the wifi feature not clear

Reviews.Title: Sony Alpha  NEX-6
Reviews.Author: BYRON FERNANDO LARIOS LOPEZ
Reviews.Content: I'm very glad and totally satisfied with the camera. Is extraordinary and, as always, Sony no defrauded me like Amazon with his service.
